title: Drawing, "Decorative panel for July Festival", 1835
medium: watercolor, gouache, black ink, wash, graphite on tan paper mounted on off-white laid paper
inscribed: (by a later hand) upper center margin of mount in graphite: Fêtes de Juillet 1835; lower center margin: Juillet 1835.
dimensions:
sheet:  2 11/16 x 6 7/8 inches (6.7 x 17.5 cm)
mount:  17 3/8 x 11 5/16 inches (44.1 x 28.7 cm)
description: Design for a panel ornamented with an abstract vine motif and flowers in pink, blue, green, and yellow on a green ground.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Decorative panel for July Festival", 1835. watercolor, gouache, black ink, wash, graphite on tan paper mounted on off-white laid paper. 1991-17-13.
